items.title: Frosby Website
items.description: This website is for a AI company to showcase their abstract digital art.

en.headline: Corta & Mateo is a web design agency that focuses on delivering high quality, impactful, easily-editable websites.

description.html: Provide your audience with a clear message and compelling call to action. We craft clean, modern, and intuitive web designs so your audience can easily take the next step whether that's contacting you, signing up for a newsletter, or purchasing your product.
description.markdown: Provide your audience with a clear message and compelling call to action. We craft clean, modern, and intuitive web designs so your audience can easily take the next step whether that's contacting you, signing up for a newsletter, or purchasing your product.

description.html: Manage and edit your site with ease and peace of mind. We use a secure, user-friendly, high quality platform for hosting sites.
description.markdown: Manage and edit your site with ease and peace of mind. We use a secure, user-friendly, high quality platform for hosting sites.

description.html: Enhance your website's visibility and organic traffic. We incorporate SEO best practices including keyword research, on-page optimization, meta tag creation, and other techniques to boost your search engine rankings and attract relevant visitors.
description.markdown: Enhance your website's visibility and organic traffic. We incorporate SEO best practices including keyword research, on-page optimization, meta tag creation, and other techniques to boost your search engine rankings and attract relevant visitors.

en.heading: Book a discovery call to see if we're a good fit for your next project.

content.html: Let us know what you want and we'll get back to you at our earliest convenience, assuming we get back to you at all.
content.markdown: Let us know what you want and we'll get back to you at our earliest convenience, assuming we get back to you at all.
